products.name: Tov Furniture Remy Black Velvet Swivel Chair
products.brandedName: TOV Furniture Remy Black Velvet Swivel Chair
products.description: Color/finish: black upholstered Part of the Black collection Comfort, Swivel, Fab style; need we say more? The Remy chair's sturdy kiln-dried pine frame and high-density foam fill offer comfort and durability and its plush velvet upholstery is all the invitation we need. Available in multiple color options to complement your space. Measures 25.5in x 27.1in x 28.3in 20.8 x 22.6 x 16.1in seat Velvet, Pine, Plywood Spot Clean Only Imported

products.name: Suzette 1 - Light Single Globe Pendant
products.brandedName: Mistana Suzette 1 - Light Single Globe Pendant
products.description: This pendant light lets you add a warm, welcoming glow to your kitchen island, entryway, or living room. Crafted from steel, it features a slim central rod surrounded by a clear glass shade with a gourd shape and a fluted texture. Inside, it suits a single 60W standard bulb (sold separately), while up top, it hangs from a sloped ceiling-compatible canopy and a height-adjustable downrod. Best of all, it's compatible with dimmer switches, so it's easy to set just the right mood wherever you add it. Finish: Satin Nickel

products.name: Barnwell 20" Table Lamp
products.brandedName: Beachcrest Home Barnwell 20" Table Lamp
products.description: This 20" table lamp features a bold base that adds an airy, coastal vibe to spaces of all sorts. The base is made from textured glass with a striking round silhouette and in the gorgeous solid finish of your choice. The base is highlighted by the gleaming silver neck and topped with a cylindrical hardback drum-shaped shade in a neutral finish. Easy to operate with the rotary socket switch, this lamp accommodates a single bulb up to 60W (sold separately). Base Color: Green Meadow

products.name: Minnetrista 30" Single Bathroom Vanity Set
products.brandedName: Andover Mills Minnetrista 30" Single Bathroom Vanity Set
products.description: This 2.5' wide single bathroom vanity set lets you add style and storage to your bathroom. It's made from solid wood and has a neutral finish that complements all sorts of color palettes. A drawer helps organize your bathroom essentials, as does the two-door cabinet with an adjustable shelf inside. We love the honed white marble countertop and backsplash and included a white ceramic sink that gives it a fresh, clean feel. Drain assembly, faucet, mirror, and P-trap are sold separately. Finish: Gray

products.name: Tinsman Green Indoor / Outdoor Area Rug
products.brandedName: Sol 72 Outdoor Tinsman Green Indoor / Outdoor Area Rug
products.unbrandedName: Tinsman Green Indoor / Outdoor Area Rug
products.description: This indoor/outdoor rug features bold, circular floating medallions that bring a vibrant look to your space. These floral blooms come in a collection of green, orange, and blue tones over an off-white background. Power-loomed from water- and stain-resistant polypropylene, this area rug's 0.28" pile height makes it an ideal foundation for living rooms, entryways, and covered patios. Even with a jute backing, we recommend pairing it with a rug pad (sold separately) to keep it from shifting underfoot. Rug Size: Rectangle 3'3" x 5'

products.name: Rollmaster™ Lite 28" Expandable Large Checked Hardside Spinner Luggage
products.brandedName: Travelpro Rollmaster™ Lite 28" Expandable Large Checked Hardside Spinner Luggage
products.unbrandedName: Rollmaster™ Lite 28" Expandable Large Checked Hardside Spinner Luggage
products.description: Take all of your travel essentials with you while on the go with a durable hardside, spinner luggage. 30" x 19.5" x 12.5", Weight: 11 lbs (Including wheels) Adjustable Height Control: Push-button extension handle has two stops, maximizing comfort and control for users of different heights Hardshell Protection: ABS material with textured surface ensures lightweight durability and protection of contents 2" Additional Packing Space: Roomy main compartment has tapered expansion up to 2” maximizing packing flexibility while keeping the center of gravity low Smooth & Sturdy Wheels: Our 8-wheel Spinners are simple to navigate through busy airports and glide effortlessly in every direction Less Weight, More Packing: Ultra lightweight design allows you to pack more contents Maximum Packing: Spacious interior provides packing efficiency for clothing and essentials Separation of Belongings: Zippered 50/50 divider panel provides packing options and keeps contents in place Additional Organization: Zippered lid compartment and built-in accessory pocket provide packing options for organizing, separating and securing contents ABS exterior, textile lining Imported
products.aiDescription: Introducing the Rollmaster™ Lite 28" Expandable Large Checked Hardside Spinner Luggage from TRAVELPRO. This unisex suitcase, available at Nordstrom Rack, is perfect for fashion-forward travelers. With its durable hardside construction and spinner wheels, this luggage is designed to withstand the rigors of travel. The adjustable height control and lightweight design make it easy to maneuver, while the spacious interior and additional packing space ensure you can pack all your essentials. Stay organized with the zippered divider panel and additional compartments. Travel in style and convenience with this sleek and functional luggage. Imported.

products.name: Personality Boss Lady Needlepoint Pillow
products.brandedName: Jonathan Adler Personality Boss Lady Needlepoint Pillow
products.description: Put it all out there - our Needlepoint Personality Pillows announce your innermost identity in bold bars of color. Each pillow is embroidered by hand and backed in luxe velvet. Forget the fusty needlepoint of yore and embrace our sharp, chic world.

products.name: Courchevel 34.5" W Polyester Armchair
products.brandedName: Kelly Clarkson Home Courchevel 34.5" W Polyester Armchair
products.description: This armchair brings a French country look to your living room or den with its turned front legs and rolled arms. Its frame is made from solid and engineered wood, and the legs have a deep walnut finish for a rustic touch in your space. This 34.5" wide chair has a square back and a removable and reversible seat cushion with deep seating that's upholstered in polyester with foam filling for lots of support while you sit. The back cushion is attached. Plus, we love that this chair includes all the tools you need for fuss-free assembly.Hand-curated by Kelly Clarkson. Body Fabric: Navy Polyester Blend

products.name: Starnes Low Profile Standard Bed
products.brandedName: Astoria Grand Starnes Low Profile Standard Bed
products.description: This Panel Bed is an essential addition to any bedroom dcor. This piece showcases a solid wood frame, fortified by dovetail construction for long-lasting quality. The curved headboard and low footboard feature decorative paneling detail, while beautiful finials and wood carving trim lend gorgeous accents. Size: Queen

products.name: Merriwood Ikat Teal/Charcoal/Aqua Indoor / Outdoor Area Rug
products.brandedName: Langley Street™ Merriwood Ikat Teal/Charcoal/Aqua Indoor / Outdoor Area Rug
products.unbrandedName: Merriwood Ikat Teal/Charcoal/Aqua Indoor / Outdoor Area Rug
products.description: Top off your living space, patio, or office with boho flair. This area rug features a geometric design with an array of lace-style medallions, scattered across the background in teal, charcoal, and aqua hues. Power-loomed from 100% olefin fabric, it sports a low 0.12'' pile height that won't trip up your feet or your vacuum in high-traffic areas, like hallways and kitchens. No matter where in your home this area rug ends up, we recommend pairing it with a rug pad for added cushioning and traction. Rug Size: Rectangle 3'6" x 5'6"

products.name: Monty 4-Light Dimmable Brushed Nickel Vanity Light
products.brandedName: Breakwater Bay Monty 4-Light Dimmable Brushed Nickel Vanity Light
products.unbrandedName: Monty 4-Light Dimmable Brushed Nickel Vanity Light
products.description: Embrace transitional design with the Monty collection of bath and vanity lights.

products.name: Nyx Round Pedestal End Table
products.brandedName: Laurel Foundry Modern Farmhouse Nyx Round Pedestal End Table
products.description: This end table features a round table top and a pedestal base with curved legs for a classic cottage look we just love. Crafted from both solid and engineered wood, it comes in a two-tone distressed finish of off-white and chestnut brown for plenty of contrast and a modern farmhouse style. It measures 27" tall and 21" wide to provide space to rest an accent lamp or your favorite potted plant. With versatile placement options available, this side table is a beneficial surface for your living room, den, or bedroom.

products.name: 7-Piece Knife Block Set, Pastel Blue
products.brandedName: Smeg 7-Piece Knife Block Set, Pastel Blue
products.description: Knife block made of acacia wood and steel. Includes chef knife, bread knife, santoku knife, utility knife, steak knife, paring knife. Block features antislip grip bottom. Knives made of stainless steel. Approx. 8"W x 12.5"D x 16"T. Hand wash. Imported.

products.name: Bethesda Drapery Panel - 50"W x 108"L
products.brandedName: Ballard Designs Bethesda Drapery Panel - 50"W x 108"L
products.description: "Ikat is an ancient dyeing technique used throughout the world to create soft geometric patterns that look as fresh and on-trend today as they did centuries ago. Our Bethesda Drapery Panel is printed in a Ikat pattern of blue, indigo, sky and white on crisp linen blend. Frame your windows with these designer drapes to give them instant global sophistication. Hangs from 3"" rod pocket or hidden tabs.Bethesda Drapery Panel features: Ikat curtain panel. Cotton lined for privacy & sun protection. Made in the USA."
products.aiDescription: Introducing the Bethesda Drapery Panel by Ballard Designs, a stunning addition to your home decor. This Ikat curtain panel showcases the timeless beauty of the ancient dyeing technique, with its soft geometric patterns in shades of blue, indigo, sky, and white. Made from a crisp linen blend, these designer drapes will instantly elevate the look of any room. With a 3" rod pocket or hidden tabs, hanging them is a breeze. Plus, they are cotton lined for privacy and sun protection. Made in the USA, these drapery panels are the perfect blend of style and functionality.

products.name: Casella Angled Hairpin Base Metal Table Lamp With Fabric Shade
products.brandedName: Zipcode Design Casella Angled Hairpin Base Metal Table Lamp With Fabric Shade
products.unbrandedName: Casella Angled Hairpin Base Metal Table Lamp With Fabric Shade
products.description: Bring eye-catching style and glam touch to your living room or entryway with this 17'' accent lamp. Crafted from metal, this lamp shows off a dynamic design with an open tripod base made with hairpin-inspired legs. Its dark brown espresso hue shows off a reflective chrome finish that adds a luminous effect while still making itself at home in refined, contemporary aesthetics. With a white fabric drum shade that contrasts the lines of the base, this lamp is the ideal piece anywhere you need to shed a little extra light. It requires a single standard bulb of up to 100W (sold separately).

products.name: Allegrezza Standard Bed
products.brandedName: Kelly Clarkson Home Allegrezza Standard Bed
products.description: Classic French-inspired bed, with its ornately carved wood border and upholstered head and footboard. Made from a solid and engineered wood frame, it features fabric upholstery surrounded by nailhead trim. The wood and cream fabric combine to create a neutral bedroom centerpiece that still makes a statement. It boasts beveled detailing at its base, adding another understated yet decorative touch to your traditional or French country home. This bed requires a box spring (sold separately). Hand-curated by Kelly Clarkson. Size: Queen

products.name: Sturminster Rustic Industrial Solid Wood Metal Frame Rectangular Desk With Storage
products.brandedName: 17 Stories Sturminster Rustic Industrial Solid Wood Metal Frame Rectangular Desk With Storage
products.unbrandedName: Sturminster Rustic Industrial Solid Wood Metal Frame Rectangular Desk With Storage
products.description: This collection of rustic wood and metal provides unpolished elegance to your space. With functional drawers, each piece is uniquely yours. Knots, cracks, and even rough-hewn edges showcase the wood's original qualities. The lacquer finish with light and dark tones allows for the wood's natural grain to show through. This compact wood and metal desk lets you create an office nook even in the smallest space. Size: 30" H x 48" W x 23" D

products.name: Champagne Bears Small Cube 4-Piece Kit
products.brandedName: sugarfina Champagne Bears Small Cube 4-Piece Kit
products.description: Made with Dom Pérignon Vintage Champagne, these sophisticated bears sparkle in flavors of classic Brut and fashionable Rosé. Named "the perfect party favor" by Cosmopolitan magazine, these grownup gummies are the finest bears in all of candy land. A Sugarfina exclusive. Includes four small cubes. Each approx. 2.18"Sq. Nonalcoholic. Made in Germany.

products.name: Cadriet Outdoor Ottoman with Cushion
products.brandedName: Kelly Clarkson Home Cadriet Outdoor Ottoman with Cushion
products.description: This pouf ottoman brings modern style and a textured design to your porch or patio ensemble. It's made from polyester and features a kilim-inspired pattern with a faded mix of orange, ivory, and light blue hues that complement aesthetics from rustic to industrial. This ottoman has a cube silhouette with piped detailing for a tactile look and feel. And, its bead fill provides plenty of support. We love that this puffy pouf is versatile enough to use as a footrest or as a landing pad for a tray of snacks.Hand-curated by Kelly Clarkson.

products.name: Eldredge 22" Brass Gold Table Lamp
products.brandedName: Charlton Home Eldredge 22" Brass Gold Table Lamp
products.description: This table lamp is hand-painted and glazed with antiqued brass ornamentation. The tapered linen hardback shade adds quiet grandeur to the traditional design. Finished with a brass finial on the top and a silk-wrapped cord in the back, it's the perfect addition to your traditional space. Base Color: Blue/White

products.name: Cici 2 Drawer Nightstand
products.brandedName: Kelly Clarkson Home Cici 2 Drawer Nightstand
products.description: This rustic nightstand makes an ideal bedside partner for a morning cup of coffee and a table lamp. This table is made from a blend of solid and engineered wood, and it features a heavily scored and distressed natural finish for a vintage look and organic appeal. As for storage, it has a felt-lined shelf up top for more delicate items, while lower storage cabinets roll out on metal glides, offering room for books, reading, glasses, and chargers. Plus, this nightstand comes with brass-finished handles for an extra layer of French country charm. Hand-curated by Kelly Clarkson.

products.name: Montreuil 5 - Light Candle Style Classic Chandelier
products.brandedName: Kelly Clarkson Home Montreuil 5 - Light Candle Style Classic Chandelier
products.unbrandedName: Montreuil 5 - Light Candle Style Classic Chandelier
products.description: This 5-light classic chandelier illuminates your living space with ambient light and traditional style. The classic look complements a French country or transitional interior. The round canopy and height-adjustable and sloped-ceiling compatible download are made from steel with a neutral metallic finish. This single-tier chandelier showcases five candelabra-style holders and bulbs (sold separately) which produce pleasing, ambient lighting over your dining room table or in your center hall. Whats more, it is dimmer switch compatible and rated for damp locations so its also a great choice for a room prone to moisture. Assembly is required.Hand-curated by Kelly Clarkson. Finish: Black

products.name: Ezra Solid Wood Mid Century Bed Frame
products.brandedName: George Oliver Ezra Solid Wood Mid Century Bed Frame
products.unbrandedName: Ezra Solid Wood Mid Century Bed Frame
products.description: Diamond tufted to perfection, the Queen Platform Bed Frame is a modern day masterpiece. It blends the most beautiful elements of elegant bedroom furniture with contemporary decor to bring out the best in mid century modern design. This queen bed frame with a headboard starts off strong, with an eye-catching, diamond tufted, upholstered headboard in a beautiful beige fabric. The soft polyester blend fabric makes for a plush and comfortable place to rest your head, day or night.The queen bed's upholstered headboard contrasts with the wood bed frame and splayed legs, which have a gold cap to infuse chicness into every possible part of this piece. As if that's not enough, this is a platform queen bed, which means no box spring is required. That's one less thing to worry about when you're assembling the queen size bed. Can we get a Hallelujah? Functional, fashionable, and fit for royalty, the platform queen bed frame delivers. Color (Frame/Headboard): Walnut/Gray, Size: Queen
products.aiDescription: Introducing the Borup Queen Tufted Wood Low Profile Platform Bed by George Oliver, available at Wayfair. This unisex bed is perfect for fashion-forward individuals looking to add a touch of mid-century modern style to their bedroom. Crafted from solid and engineered wood in a walnut finish, this bed features brass-capped tapered and splayed legs for a retro look. The headboard is upholstered in polyester with button tufting for added vintage appeal. With slats included, you can skip the box spring and customize with your choice of mattress. Size: Queen. Color (Frame/Headboard): Walnut/Gray.

products.name: Canipe Gray/Gold Area Rug
products.brandedName: Viv + Rae Canipe Gray/Gold Area Rug
products.description: This indoor area rug lends a textured foundation to your floors with its marble-inspired patterns for a modern look. Ivory hues on top with streaks of gold and dark gray throughout provide visual interest and plenty of glam style. It's power-loomed from polypropylene and polyester with the highest pile height being 0.39". This medium pile allows you to roll out this rug in your living room, dining room, or your teen's bedroom. Even though it has a jute backing, we recommend pairing it with a rug pad underneath (sold separately). Rug Size: Rectangle 5'5" x 7'7"

products.name: Weisberg Solid Wood Low Profile Platform Bed
products.brandedName: Mercury Row Weisberg Solid Wood Low Profile Platform Bed
products.unbrandedName: Weisberg Solid Wood Low Profile Platform Bed
products.description: This platform bed frame has a minimalist aesthetic that grounds your bedroom in a modern look. It's made from solid acacia wood with an American walnut brown hue and a rustic finish. The headboard strikes a rectangular silhouette and features an asymmetrical design with angled, geometric lines carved into the wood. Low, flared feet complete the contemporary vibe of this bed frame. Best of all, a box spring isn't required, so all you have to do is add the mattress of your choice (sold separately). This piece is crafted from natural wood. Color and character of wood grain may vary, adding a unique character to your piece. Size: Queen
products.aiDescription: Introducing the Wickham solid wood low profile platform bed by Wade Logan, available at Wayfair. This unisex bed is perfect for those seeking a modern and minimalist aesthetic for their bedroom. Crafted from solid acacia wood, it features a beautiful American walnut brown hue with a rustic finish. The headboard boasts an asymmetrical design with angled, geometric lines carved into the wood, adding a unique touch to the overall look. With low, flared feet, this bed frame exudes a contemporary vibe. The best part? No box spring is required, making it hassle-free to add the mattress of your choice (sold separately). Available in Queen size.

products.name: Lamons 25" Table Lamp Set
products.brandedName: Rosecliff Heights Lamons 25" Table Lamp Set
products.description: The Beachcrest Home Dunwich Shell 25"c H Table Lamp with Empire Shade (Set of 2) makes for a fine addition to homes with coastal and contemporary interiors. The light shade of these table lamps illuminates their surroundings with soft ambient light. The natural texture of seashells gives an aesthetic appeal to these decorative table lamps. The Dunwich 25"H Table Lamp with Empire Shade (Set of 2) by Beachcrest Home is made up of table lamps that can accommodate incandescent light bulbs. Shell and polyresin are used in the making of these table lamps, and this serves to make them durable. These decorative lighting fixtures require minimal maintenance and can be wiped clean with a soft cloth.

products.name: Bodhi Dome Pendant - Antique Brass, 22" x 30"
products.brandedName: Ballard Designs Bodhi Dome Pendant - Antique Brass, 22" x 30"
products.unbrandedName: Bodhi Dome Pendant - Antique Brass, 22" x 30"
products.description: The dome silhouette creates a warm glow over your dining table, breakfast nook or kitchen island. Our Bodhi Dome Pendant light is handmade of aluminum and iron with textured exterior for an aged look. Interior is finished in smooth, matte antique brass.Bodhi Dome Pendant features:Handmade of aluminum & iron. Small: 1-light fixture, clear cord. Large: 3-light fixture, clear cord.

products.name: Salerno Glass Door Console
products.brandedName: Ballard Designs Salerno Glass Door Console

Crafted from 100% wool in India, it boasts a plush 0.5" pile height, making it perfect for low-traffic areas like bedrooms and home offices. For added stability, pair it with a rug pad (sold separately). Rug Size: Runner 2'3" x 8'. Elevate your space with this timeless piece.

products.name: Kingsville 88.49" Velvet Round Arm Sofa
products.brandedName: Rosdorf Park Kingsville 88.49" Velvet Round Arm Sofa
products.description: The contemporary velvet sofa is a wonderful addition to the modern household. The soft velvet upholstery and vibrant color of the couch will surely gather attention at your next social gathering. The delivers a luxurious seating experience with soft performance velvet upholstery. The sofa is padded with dense foam padding for the highest quality of comfort. Part of the collection, this beautiful chair features acrylic legs that assure durability without compromising on style. The sofa's solidly constructed plastic frame rests with secure precision on four sturdy acrylic legs and supports up to three people. Pair the sofa with the accompanying chair and loveseat to create a more cohesive living room look. We stand by the quality, craftsmanship, and integrity of our products by offering a 1-year for all our products. We want our customers to enjoy our product and we will always be there to help with our top-notch customer service support. Upholstery Color: Blue

products.name: Ayyoub Geometric Blue Area Rug
products.brandedName: Wade Logan Ayyoub Geometric Blue Area Rug
products.description: Bold and contemporary, this high-low area rug sets a modern foundation in your living room or den. It features a dynamic, geometric pattern with Greek key-inspired lines in blue and white hues. Power-loomed from a blend of chenille and viscose, it cushions your floors with a low 0.25'' pile that doesn't trip up your feet or your vacuum. Best of all, it's safe to place on heated floors. Although it comes with a jute backing, we recommend adding a rug pad to keep it from shifting and sliding. Rug Size: Rectangle 5' x 8'

products.name: Dashiya 10 - Light Unique / Statement Geometric Chandelier
products.brandedName: Brayden Studio Dashiya 10 - Light Unique / Statement Geometric Chandelier
products.unbrandedName: Dashiya 10 - Light Unique / Statement Geometric Chandelier
products.description: Built to stand out, the Dashiya 10-Light Chandelier and its dramatic silhouette will surely become a show-stopping fixture in your space. This modern chandelier that looks more like art than a lamp is designed with a curvy chrome metal rod with clear glass rod branches. Nestled within the architectural display are ten bulbs that cast an inviting glow.

products.unbrandedName: Swaney Oriental Bright Blue/Silver Gray/Medium Gray/Cream Area Rug
products.description: With its faded, traditional pattern, you'd swear this Oriental rug was an antique flea market find. Made in Turkey, this area rug features a classic floral pattern in a sisal weave. Its moderate pile height means you can vacuum it for ultimate convenience, but it's still cozy enough to spread out on when you're testing paint swatches or simply relaxing on a floor pillow. Our little secret: This heavily textured print is not only stylish it's great at hiding any spills that might happen. products.brandedName: Three Posts Freda 38" Wide Polyester Armchair
products.description: This Freda armchair brings classic design to any space. Its made with a solid + manufactured wood frame with sinuous spring construction and high-density foam cushion. The chair is upholstered in a polyester blend fabric with a gray, stone, metallic paisley pattern and features rounded arms, a removable & reversible seat cushion, and curved solid wood feet.
products.aiDescription: Introducing the Freda 38" wide polyester armchair by Three Posts, available at Wayfair. This unisex accent chair is perfect for adding a touch of classic design to your living room. Crafted with an engineered wood frame and sinuous spring construction, it offers durability and comfort. The high-density foam cushions are upholstered in a cream and taupe paisley patterned polyester blend fabric. With its rounded arms, removable seat cushion, and curved solid wood feet, this made-in-the-USA armchair is the perfect addition to any traditional space.
